remarks.para: One may be leaking provided associated bearing scavenge valve is operative.

numlitem.para: Confirm that the Bearing Scavenge valve operates normally by checking the ElCAS status page. If either the OIL SCAV OPEN or OIL SCAV VAL message is displayed, the scavenge valve has malfunctioned and dispatch is not permitted.
No dispatch with OIL SCAV OPEN or OIL SCAV VAL message displayed.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "#4 BEARING OIL SEAL LEAKING, ENG NO. _______" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If the ENG OIL SEAL EICAS message appears sporadically, it may be treated as a nuisance message unless a malfunction is confirmed by some other parameter such as a rise in temperature or high oil consumption, or unless it occurs on five consecutive flights.
